clientId.description: ID of the client requesting authorization

claims.description: Specific claims in addition to the requested scope, in the form of a JSON document, as per OIDC Core 1.0 Claims Request

redirectUri.description: URI to which the user agent is to be redirected

nonce.description: Optional value used to associate a Client session with an ID Token, and to mitigate replay attacks. The value is passed through unmodified from the Authorization Request to the ID Token.

userId.description: ID of the user approving this request (set by server)

authenticatedAt.description: Timestamp marking when approving user was authenticated (set by server)

authorizedAt.description: Timestamp marking when authorization was approved (set by server)
